definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: set, appoint (poet.) (‖ form of [[שׁית]] Ges:§ 67 ee);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[כַּצּאׁן לִשְׁאוֹל שַׁתּוּ]] Ps 49:15 they have been appointed (lit. they have appointed them, indef. subj.) like a flock for Shₑ’ôl, but Gr rds. [[שָׁ֫חוּ]] ([[שׁוח]]), Bae:3 [[יֵחַתּוּ]] ([[נחת]]); [[שַׁתּוּ בַשָּׁמַים פִּיהֶם]] Ps 73:9 (‖[[וּלְשׁוֹנׇם תִּהֲלַח בָּאָרֶץ ]]) p. 1001
